Synopsis:
----------------
Ousmane (Sotigui Kouyate) is a Muslim living in France, Ms. Sommers (Oscar nominee Brenda Blethyn) is a Christian war widow who lives on an island in the English Channel. Although they are unknown and both have different religious backgrounds, these strangers will be joined in London by a shared tragedy: each of us has lost contact with her son since the day of the attacks - Mrs. Sommers her daughter Ousmane Jane and his son Ali. Together we will track the city in search of their loved ones, fused by the hope that they will live.
